full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL 'KHOR LO SDOM PA ZHES BYA BA RNAL 'BYOR MA CHEN MO'I RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @170B (RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO PAD MA KA RA SPAR MA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA DGE SLONG RIN CHEN BZANG POS BSGYUR ZHING ZHUS TE GTAN @171A *, ,LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SBAS PA'I NYI MA DANG, BOD KYI LO TZTSA BA 'GOS LHAS BTZAS KYIS SLOB DPON TSAN PO LA BA PA'I 'GREL BA DANG BSTUN NAS BCOS PA'O,, ,,YANG SLAD NAS RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SU MA TI KIR TI DANG, BOD KYI MKHAS PA CHEN PO MAR PA CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GIS ZHUS TIG BGYIS PA'O,, ,,@171B MDZES SDUG BRJID PA'I NYAMS DGU'I 'JO SGEG CAN, ,H'Um H'Um GSUNG GIS BDUD BZHI'I KLAD PA 'GEMS, BDE STONG RO GCIG DANG DU ROL BA, BLA MA HE RU KA LA BDAG 'DUD DO, ,DE LA DGYES PA BSKYED MDZAD PA, ZAG MED BDE BA RAB RGYAS MA, ,SHES RAB LI KHRI'I MDANGS KYIS SKEG ,RDO RJE PHAG MOS BDAG SKYONG SHIG ,RAB 'BYAMS RGYUD SDE'I SA 'DZIN DBUS, ,RI DBANG @172A *, ,LTA BUR MNGON PHAGS PA, 'KHOR LO SDOM PA'I RGYUD RGYAL 'DI, BYIN RLABS NYI ZLA'I RNA LUNG GIS, ,DUS MTHA'I RGUD MUN RAB BSAL TE, ,DNGOS GRUB MCHOG GI SNANG BA STZOL, ,GRUB BRNYES KUN GYI SPYI NOR STE, ,RIG 'DZIN YONGS KYI 'JUG NGOGS MCHOG ,DE PHYIR 'DI LA MOS PA'I BLOS, ,'DI NYID KUN TU RGYAS BYA'I PHYIR, ,SNGAGS 'CHANG ROL PA'I RDO RJE YIS, @172B ,RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE SPAR DU BSGRUBS, 'DI YI PHYOGS SU SGO GSUM RE RES KYANG, ,MTHUN PA'I RKYEN SBYAR YI RANGS BGYIS RNAMS KYANG, ,LAM MCHOG 'DI DANG NAM YANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, 'KHOR LO SDOM PAS RJES SU 'DZIN GYUR CIG ,THUB BSTAN SNYING PO BLO BZANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN, ,NAM MKHA' JI SRID PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS PA DANG, @173A *, ,SKYE DGU MTHA' DAG CHOS MTHUN DGE BAR SPYOD, ,DKAR PHYOGS LHA RNAMS MTHU STOBS RGYAS GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,,)
